H0.text: Which is the smallest marine mammal. Phocoena

H1.text: Which is the smallest marine mammal. Neophoca

H2.text: Which is the smallest marine mammal. Otaria

H3.text: Which is the smallest marine mammal. Enhydra

A4.text: Reaching a maximum body length of 150 cm (4.9 ft) (females) or 140 cm (4.6 ft) (males), it is the smallest of all living cetaceans.
